sourcesContent:
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux';

import { Button, Card, Divider, Typography,Grid, CardMedia, Box} from "@mui/material"
import { useState } from 'react';
import StarBorderIcon from '@mui/icons-material/StarBorder';

const ShoppingCart = () => {

    const cartItems = useSelector((state) => state.cart.value)
   

    const [emptyMsg] = useState('Tu cesta se encuentra vacia')
    const [currency] = useState('$')
    console.log(cartItems)
    return (
        <Box sx={{ minHeight: '800px'}}>
            <Card>
                <Box>
                    <Typography>My Cesta</Typography>
                </Box>
                <Box >
                    {!cartItems ?
                        <Typography>{emptyMsg}</Typography>
                        :
                        cartItems.map((item) => {
                            return (
                                <CardMedia raised sx={{ height: '250px',m:2 , p: 2 }}>
                                    <Grid container spacing={2} sx={{height: '100%'}}>
                                        <Grid item xs={6}>
                                            <Card sx={{ height: '80%' }}>
                                                <Card
                                                    component="img"
                                                    image={item.image}
                                                    alt={item.title}
                                                    sx={{
                                                        height:'100%',
                                                        '&.MuiCardMedia-img': {
                                                            objectFit: 'contain',
                                                            height: '100%',
                                                            width: '100%',
                                                        }
                                                    }}
                                                />
                                            </Card>
                                        </Grid>
                                        <Grid item xs={6}>
                                            <Box sx={{ height: '250px' }}>
                                                <Box sx={{ height: '35%', mb: 2 }}>
                                                    <Typography variant="h3" component="div">{item.title}</Typography>
                                                </Box>
                                                <Box sx={{ height: '20%', mb: 2 }}>
                                                    <Typography variant='h6' sx={{ mb: 1.5 }} >{currency} {item.price}</Typography>
                                                    <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', flecFlow: 'row noWrap', alignContent: 'center', mb: 1 }}>
                                                        <Typography variant='subtitle2'
                                                            sx={{ p: '1px' }} >Rating: {item.rating.rate}
                                                        </Typography>
                                                        <StarBorderIcon color='warning' />
                                                    </Box>
                                                </Box>
                                                <Box sx={{ height: '30%', mb: 2, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }}>
                                                    <Typography variant="h5">Description:</Typography>
                                                    <Typography variant="body">{item.description}</Typography>
                                                </Box>
                                            </Box>
                                        </Grid>

                                    </Grid>

                                </CardMedia>
                            )
                        })

                    }
                </Box>
                <Box>
                    <Divider />
                    <Button>Continuar comprando</Button>
                </Box>
                <Box>
                    <Typography>Total</Typography>
                    <Divider />
                    <Button>Continuar</Button>
                </Box>


            </Card>
        </Box>
    )
}

export default ShoppingCart
